unnormalised: Hey! Been trying mental health apps lately. Feeling a bit like Deepika in Tamasha some days, you know? Anyone else find them helpful? My cousin, Priya, at AIIMS Delhi recommended a few. Maybe good for destressing after a long day navigating Mumbai traffic. What apps work best for you folks? Need some guidance!
